fields.name: role
fields.title: role
fields.description: whether respondent is a scientist or resident (with residents who work at associations denoted as association)

fields.name: group
fields.description: whether respondent is a scientist or resident
fields.title: group

fields.name: location
fields.title: location of residence while in Moorea
fields.description: including the two research stations Gump and Criobe

fields.name: opinion_of_marine_management
fields.title: opinion on local marine protected area management

fields.name: very_happy_satisfied_with_job
fields.title: is the respondent very happy or very satisfied with their job

fields.name: family_and_friends_important_component_life
fields.title: did they list family and friends as one of the most important components of life

fields.name: environment_important_component_life
fields.title: did they list the environment as one of the most important components of life

fields.name: helping_others_compassion_community_important_component_life
fields.title: did they list helping others of compassion as one of the most important components of life

fields.name: not_enough_interaction
fields.title: did they unprompted say that there is not enough interaction between researchers and residents
fields.description: when answering the question how would you describe the relationship between Moorea's residents and research stations

fields.name: opinion_on_resident_researcher_relationship
fields.description: when answering the question how would you describe the relationship between Moorea's residents and research stations: mixed signfies that they gave both good and bad examples of relationships between research stations and residents

fields.name: opinion_on_if_researchers_should_study_culture
fields.title: should researchers study culture
fields.description: if no, they indicated that this topics is not the place of scientists to work

fields.name: opinion_on_if_researchers_should_study_transportation
fields.description: if no, they indicated that this topics is not the place of scientists to work
fields.title: should researchers study transportation

fields.name: opinion_on_researchers_having_meetings_before_research
fields.title: should researchers hold community meetings before starting new research projcts
fields.description: If no, they indicated that scientists should not do this.

fields.name: opinion_on_giving_priority_jobs_to_Polynesians
fields.description: If no, they indicated that scientists should not do this.
fields.title: should priority be given to Polynesians for jobs associated with researcher

name: resident-researcher-data
title: Relationship between residents and researchers
description: Subset of data collected in Moorea, French Polynesia under French Polynesia and UCSB IRB approval. Data were collected in partnership with the Atiti'a Center.
